description:
At BoxingScience, this is what we hear from you...

"I want to be world champion"

"I want to be respected in the gym"

"I want to transform my life"

We will help you whatever yourÂ problem is...

"I train hard but I always gas out"

"I'm not confident in my fitness"

"I want to take my fighters to the next level"

We will show you how, whatever your challenges...

"I'm confused, people keep telling me train like this and that"

"I don't know where the best source of knowledge is"

"Am I doing the right thing?"

We will give you cutting edge training practice...

  • Our aim is to translate the latest and classic scientific research into understandable and actionable training methods
  • We believe that everyone should have access to the same knowledge and methods as elite athletes
  • We know that you should be training smart

The course will transform the way you think about and perform your conditioning.

That means...

  • No long runs and slow plods - No pounding pavements for hours on end
  • No more chasing chickens
  • No early mornings (sleep is important)
  • No more 3-hour sessions
  • No complicated program. No specialist equipment.

In this course you will get:

  • A complete 12-week running-based conditioning program; that's been scientifically validated and used successfully with our champion boxers
  • Links to our key resources we use with our elite combat athletes
  • Insights into the tools we use to train our high-performance fighters and one's you can use too
  • Access to our Udemy Student Support

As a bonus, you will also get:

  • Access to the Boxing Science Performance Network - Unique access to world leading experts in a closed facebook group
title: High-performance conditioning for boxers and combat athletes
